wikipedia_page.main:
Graham Barry Dunlop (born 21 May 1976, in Glasgow) is a Scottish field hockey player.
Dunlop was a member of the Great Britain and Northern Ireland squad that finished ninth at the 2004 Olympics in Athens.
He now teaches physical education at Hutchesons' Grammar School, Glasgow, where he explores his newfound football and basketball skills.
